name: JS Party
description: A weekly celebration of JavaScript and the web.

name: NebraskaJS
description: A community of JavaScript developers in Nebraska.

name: TalkScript
description: A podcast about the TypeScript language and community.
highlights: Interviwed guests from the TypeScript community
Interviewed Anders Hejlsberg, the creator of TypeScript
Interviewed Ryan Dahl, the creator of Node.js and Deno
Interviewed the TypeScript team at Microsoft

name: Dojo
description: A modern, reactive framework for building efficient and scalable web applications.
highlights: Contributed to the Dojo 1.x framework and its supporting libraries
Contributed to the Dojo 2+ framework and its supporting libraries
Contributed to the Dojo CLI, including a codemod tool to help with upgrading from Dojo 2 to Dojo 3

name: TypeDoc
description: A documentation generator for TypeScript projects.

name: CodeSandbox
description: An online editor for rapid prototyping and sharing of web applications.
highlights: First outside contributor of new framework support (Dojo).

name: nicknisi dotfiles
description: A collection of configuration files for my development environment.
highlights: Maintainer of a popular dotfiles repository with more than 3,000 stars on GitHub

name: NEJS Conf
description: A conference for JavaScript developers in Nebraska.
highlights: Speakers from all over the world

name: TypeScript Conf
description: A single day, single track conference highlighting TypeScript and the TypeScript community.
